    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be able to navigate through the CUB&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s system
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Collections experience required
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within two weeks of submitting your application.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

item.title: Interior Designer
item.description:
Interior Furniture Designer

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

A leading provider of workspace products and services in Houston is seeking a highly motivated designer to join their Furniture Design Team with a primary focus to support and increase sales of their vendor&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s furniture system as well as provide technical expertise to the Architect and Design Community and end users.&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Compensation: $60,000 to $80,000 annually

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Responsibilities

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and thrive in a fast-paced
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • environment
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to develop and maintain outstanding working relationships with customers
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • to ensure customer satisfaction
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Assist sales efforts by working on and compiling request for proposal responses, design
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • concepts and budgets
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to foresee potential design or product installation issues
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Client-oriented leadership skills in a highly collaborative setting
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Qualified candidates should exhibit strong design, organization and
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • communication skills
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Assist in all aspects of the design process from furniture design
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • development and concepts through specification, presentation, completion
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • and installation of commercial furniture projects
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintain proficiency on all Teknion furniture products and attending training
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • programs as required. Some travel.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Requirements

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • A professional degree from a CIDA accredited Interior Design Program
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • 2+years of professional design experience preferred
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • High proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel,Outlook) and knowledge of AutoCAD. ProjectMatrix, Adobe (InDesign),Bluebeam preferred
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience in a construction or installation industry a plus
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience in modular furniture or furnishings required
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Enthusiasm and willingness to learn
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Strong customer service skills with the ability to work effectively with all levels as the audience may vary dramatically depending upon the task or requirement
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to clearly and professionally communicate with team members and clients both verbally and in writing
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintain professional behavior on daily basis, preserving self-confidence, motivation, and self-esteem of others
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Offer solutions for problems or issues that arise; works collaboratively with others and be a strong team player willing to take on new processes
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Proactively build effective working relationships with others seeking to understand others, enhance others&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo; ideas, and place higher priority on team or organizational goals than on own goals taking prompt action to accomplish objectives
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Multitask between projects as necessary to maintain up-to-date information and keep all parties involved in the loop
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Work effectively on multiple projects while managing deliverables and communicating work output accordingly
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

**Due to the high volume of applications we receive, we regret that we are unable to personally respond to each applicant. &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Should your resume be chosen to move forward in the process, you will typically&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;be contacted within 3 weeks.**

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

item.title: Sr. Non Metal Material Scientist
item.description:
Seeking a Non Metal Material Scientist&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Salary: $98,000 - $148,000

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Location: Houston, TX

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

RESPONSIBILITIES

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Conduct research, analysis, formulation, and experimentation on rubber and other elastomeric substances, for such purposes as product and process development and application, quantitative and qualitative analysis, and improvement of analytical methodologies
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Conduct materials engineering projects to enhance the function, profitability or marketability of products
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Responsible for the delivery and supervision of project-based non-metallic research test programs and reports
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Advancement to the Elastomer Engineering Manager position is mandatory and will be required of this position
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Develops elastomeric materials for new products, and develops formulas, processes, and methods for solution of elastomeric technical problems including manufacturing problems
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Analyzes elastomeric compounds to determine chemical and physical properties using industry standard techniques
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Confers with engineers regarding research, and prepares technical papers and reports
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Prepares standards and specifications for processes, facilities, products and tests
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Technical leadership and support on seals selection and qualification for all product lines
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Introduce and develop new static and dynamic seals for extreme conditions
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Develop and support seal products for sour environments
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Materials support for root cause analysis
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Lead the qualification testing for elastomer/composites/thermoplastic/coating materials
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Work assignments carried out to the highest quality level.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Responsibility for coordinating multiple projects and directing test lab technicians and junior chemists
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Plan, conduct, track and report elastomer investigations
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Recommend and specify materials for specific design and field applications
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Work and cooperate with Engineering, Office, Vendor, and Customer, Laboratory, and Shop personnel
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Provide internal elastomer consulting services
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Support day-to-day activities associated with new elastomer development and testing
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Assist in the review and solution of manufacturing problems related to elastomer production
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Prepare documentation and reports as required
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Create and maintain material specifications
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Assist in maintaining the internal elastomer Databases and updating as required
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

REQUIREMENTS

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience in formulating elastomer compounds and elastomeric manufacturing processes
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Extensive knowledge of the relationship between polymer properties, structure, and processing
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Familiar with industrial standards and specifications such as API, NORSOK and NACE standards
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Familiar with polymers (NBR, HNBR, FKM, FEPM, FFKM, PEEK, PTFE, composite, etc.) in the Oil and Gas industry
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Hand-on experience on polymer characterization methods, such as mechanical properties testing, FT-IR, DMA, DSC, TGA
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Proficient in use of word processor and spreadsheet computer software
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to communicate effectively both orally and in writing through memos and engineering reports
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be familiar with analytical tools associated with oilfield elastomers
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be able to work well with others in a team setting
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be able to effectively handle many concurrent projects
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • BS degree in chemistry, material science, chemical engineering or materials engineering
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • 15 years minimum relevant elastomers experience
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • 10 years&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo; experience in oilfield elastomers
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Travel internationally and domestically is required
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Preferred:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Knowledge or experience in composites
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Knowledge of quality systems
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • PhD Degree in Polymer Chemistry or Chemical Engineering with 5 years oilfield experience
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • 15 years&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo; experience in oilfield polymers
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 2 weeks of submitting your application.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

item.title: Firmware Engineer
item.description:
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Seeking an Embedded Firmware Engineer

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Role:&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Embedded Software Engineer (Mid- Level)

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Location:&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;N. Houston

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Salary: $75,000 - $95,000&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;+&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Life, 401K, Dental, Vision, Medical

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Responsibilities:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Seeking an Embedded Software Engineer to become a key contributor of skill and experience in our organization to make a huge individual impact.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • In this role you&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;ll design embedded software and development tools supporting client technology, specifically MWD systems. You&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;ll work with project stakeholders and management to solve real world problems, conducting root cause analysis, and addressing problems with innovative solutions.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • You&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;ll also have the opportunity to architect embedded software related to new product development, working with the technology team to realize the ambitious technical goals of the company.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Creativity, prompt execution and strong verbal skills are critical for the successful candidate.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Manage firmware development for an entire line of embedded devices
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Serve as the firmware expert supporting failure analysis and troubleshooting
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Manage firmware updates and patches to support sustaining engineering
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Develop firmware and new firmware features to support new product development
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Write scripts and test code supporting hardware testing and qualification
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ensure firmware-software compatibility by interfacing with software development team
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Requirements:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Bachelor&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or a related field
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have Oil &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp; Gas experience
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Minimum 3-5&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;years&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo; experience with Embedded Systems
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • 3-5 years of experience with C and Python
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ideal candidate will have built their career on development in C
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with communication protocols: CAN, UART, and I2C
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with Real Time Operating Systems (RTOS)
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Solid understanding of software engineering processes and the full software development lifecycle
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Nice to have

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with the TI TMS320C28x DSP family is a plus
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with HPHT designs is a plus
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 2 weeks of submitting your application.

item.title: Marketing Specialist
item.description:
Marketing Specialist

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

A fast-growing company in Houston has an immediate need for a Marketing Specialist to join their team. This role requires attention to detail and a passion for marketing.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Location: Houston, TX

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Salary: $50&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;ndash; $55K

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Responsibilities:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Develop, write, and coordinate marketing campaigns for various locations
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Coordinate paid advertising for television, broadcast, and radio
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Responsible for social media and website
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Work collaboratively with creative team
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Requirements:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Bachelor&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s degree in Marketing or a related field
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have 4+ years of experience in an agency or in-house marketing department
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Previous experience developing and writing campaigns and collateral
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have excellent copywriting, copyediting, and proofreading skills
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Proficient with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be proficient with graphic design software
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 3 weeks of your application.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

item.title: Professional Recruiter
item.description:
Kingwood Personnel is seeking a&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Recruiter&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;to join our award-winning recruiting team in our KINGWOOD office. The successful candidate will be a highly-driven, with agency recruiting experience and a strong track record of success working in a fast-paced environment.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

We invite you to visit our website (www.kingwoodpersonnel.com) to learn more about us and find out why we were named&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;one of Houston's Best Places to Work&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;by the Houston Business Journal and are a three-time winner of the&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Inc. 5000 fastest growing private companies in the US.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

*Note, this position is based in our KINGWOOD Office - local candidates only, this is not a virtual position.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Required experience:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Minimum&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;3&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;years of experience as an external (agency) recruiter
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Salary:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • One of the most generous comp plans in the industry.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Base + Commission (uncapped commissions).
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Responsibilities:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Recruit qualified professionals for both direct hire and contract positions through the use of direct recruiting, social media/web research, referrals, and networking.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Conduct in-depth interviews with recruited candidates.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Place appropriately skilled candidates on assignments and conduct quality control calls on all orders.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Achieve production targets / quotas.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintain client satisfaction through follow up and quality control activities.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Update activities in CRM (Bullhorn).
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Provide customers with appropriate information on staffing trends and related issues (salary surveys, etc.).
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 3 weeks of submitting your application.

item.title: Inspector II - San Antonio Area
item.description:
Inspector II

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

A leading company located in South of San Antonio that supplies OCTG products and services to the oil and gas industry is seeking an Inspector II.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Compensation: DOE

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Responsibilities

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Demonstrate good leadership characteristics and the ability to lead small groups to complete appropriate inspections or tests of OCTG in a timely manner under the supervision of the Operator or Management.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Complete accurate, detailed, and quality inspection reports in a timely manner.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Turn in daily production reports.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must not attempt to operate machinery, vehicle, or equipment without proper training and/or competency verification.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Responsible for keeping work areas and equipment in good, clean, working order, including maintenance, calibrations, and ample spare parts.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Protect yourself and others at all times by ensuring that everyone is wearing appropriate PPE.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Requirements

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Minimum 1-year experience with OCTG or related NDT field.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Read and write in English and Spanish.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be in good physical condition with the ability to work outdoors for extended hours while standing on feet.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Able to lift 50 pounds.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be punctual, dependable and possess a good attitude.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have a strong dedication to safety.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Meet minimum requirements for Level II Inspector for one of the following methods (VT, MT, UT, or UT Thickness), specified by SNT-TC-1A Table 6.3.1A.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

**Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 3 weeks of submitting your application.**

item.title: Warehouse Worker
item.description:
Warehouse Worker

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Dealership in Northeast Houston looking to add a warehouse worker to their staff. &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;This position will require constant work without much downtime during the day.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Responsibilities:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Prepares orders by processing requests and supply orders; pulling materials; packing boxes; placing orders in delivery area.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Completes deliveries by driving truck or van to and from vendors.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintains truck, van, or forklift by completing preventive maintenance requirements; arranging for repairs.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintains inventory controls by collecting stock location orders and printing requests.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintains quality service by following organization standards.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintains safe and clean work environment by keeping shelves, pallet area, and workstations neat; maintaining clean shipping supply area; complying with procedures, rules, and regulations.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Completes reports by entering required information.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Maintains technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing publications as necessary.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Qualifications:

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Success candidates will possess the following qualities:&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Teamwork, Coordination, Organization, Planning, Time Management, Reporting Skills, Inventory Control, Documentation Skills, Equipment Maintenance, Dependability
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to enter data accurately
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be able to lift 30 lbs to 50 lbs repetatively
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must pass background, drug screen and have clear driving record
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to work in a non-climate controlled environment
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to be on feet for extended periods of time
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Compensation:&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;$11/&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;hour

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the amount of applications received we regret to inform you that we are unable to&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;personally&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;respond to every applicant. &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Should you be chosen to move&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;forward,&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;you&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;will typically be contacted within 3 weeks.&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;

item.title: Supply Chain Coordinator
item.description:
Seeking a Logistics / Supply Chain Coordinator

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Location: Houston, TX

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Salary: $50,000 &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;ndash; $70,000

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

RESPONSIBILITIES

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Logistics for the allocated products.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Warehouse management for the allocated products.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • All administrative functions (customer service, administrative support) for the allocated products.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Imports (scheduling and tracking moves from port to destination and handling all import documents) following up on incoming overseas shipments.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Booking and tracking truck moves for the allocated products.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Booking and tracking railcar moves for the allocated products.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Answer any questions from internal and external contacts regarding status of shipments.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Handle all warehouse issues.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Find new warehouses and tanks for the allocated products when necessary.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Negotiate and define rates with warehouses and tank terminals.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Creating and sending survey instructions.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Negotiate freight rates with carriers and railcar companies. This includes initial negotiation as well as continuous optimization of rates.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Process freight and warehouse expenses.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Document all specific customer requirements in the system (delivery instructions, delivery times, etc.)
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Investigate and solve all logistics issues.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Manage, administer and process claims relating to the allocated products (if necessary in cooperation with the product manager).
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Document price agreements with carriers and warehouses.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Assisting product manager with inventory control. Updating and managing the respective inventory lists.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Entering purchase and sales orders and sending them to the respective contacts.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Administer all purchase and sales orders in NAV.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Invoice outgoing sales immediately after shipment has been effected.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Process credit and debit notes to suppliers and customers, when necessary.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Process supplier invoices, debit notes, etc.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Creating CofA&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s for outgoing shipments and sending them to the customers.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Prepare and distribute documentation for outgoing shipments.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Document and archived documentation for incoming shipments.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Covering phones when necessary, along with other colleagues that share this responsibility.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Following up on unpaid overdue invoices with customers.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

REQUIREMENTS

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Bachelor&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s degree in any field or Associate&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo;s degree in any field plus at least three years&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;rsquo; work experience in the logistics field
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have a very strong background in bulk liquid operation within the domestic market.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have experience moving Chemical products from A to B
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with Navision, Excel, Word, Outlook, Topix,
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Good communication and negotiation skills.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Good time management, prioritizing and organizational skills.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability to work self-sufficient but within a team.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Must have experience with chemical products.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with Freight rates, negotiation, and logistics.
    • &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 2&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;weeks of submitting your application.

&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;#13;

item.title: Molder
item.description:
Molder

item.title: Sr. Welding Engineer
item.description:
A large manufacturer of heat exchangers&amp;amp;amp;nbsp;is looking for a Senior Welding Engineer&amp;amp;amp;nbsp;

&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;

Salary:&amp;amp;amp;nbsp;$95,000 - $120,000 + Bonus

&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;

Location:&amp;amp;amp;nbsp; N. Houston, Texas (Will assist in relocation)

&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;

Responsibilities:

&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Responsible for ensuring that industry code (ASME, AWS, etc.) and customer requirements are properly set and completed throughout the manufacturing and fabrication processes.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Determine that appropriate processes and procedures are developed, utilized, and implemented and ensure they meet both internal and external quality requirements.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Interface with plant managers, quality and purchasing management, manufacturing technicians, and welders on production jobs and production enhancement projects.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Work extensively with external customers and their code inspectors to ensure products are produced or refurbished to the required quality level in a timely and cost effective manner.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Attends pre-fabrication meetings with customers as required.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Ensure documentation completion and document status communications to internal customers using SharePoint document management system.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Interpreting and analyzing request for quotations.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Developing detailed written weld procedures which meet code &amp;amp;amp;amp; customer requirements.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Analyze and ensure the appropriate welding materials (alloys, etc.) are included in the entire processing of the job order.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;

Requirements:

&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • BS Welding Engineering or Metallurgy with in-depth knowledge of the petrochemical industry is preferred.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • ASME B&amp;amp;amp;amp;PV Section VIII Division 1, Section II, Section IX. ASME B&amp;amp;amp;amp;PV Section VIII Division 2 and AWS code experience a plus.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • 7+ years relatable experience required for this role
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Able to read, interpret, and determine appropriate welding procedures and processes based on customer specifications and industry requirements.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Strong math and engineering background; strong communication skills (written and verbal).
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Good organizational / task tracking skills. Managing priorities for multiple assignments.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Working Conditions
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Normal office and shop environment with some travel to the shops.
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;

&amp;amp;amp;nbsp;Benefits:

&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Full Benefits
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#9;
  • Relocation Assistance
    • &amp;amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 3 weeks of submitting your application

item.title: Oracle Manufacturing Analyst
item.description:
Seeking an Oracle Manufacturing&amp;amp;nbsp;Analyst

&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;

Location: Dallas / Fort Worth, TX

&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;

Salary: $85,000 - $110,000

&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;

RESPONSIBILITIES

&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • The Oracle Applications Analyst will be a key addition to our small, but growing, IT team.&amp;amp;nbsp;
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Support daily operations in Oracle Applications R12 modules related to and dependent on Manufacturing such as Inventory control, Transportation Management, Manufacture, MRP and ASCP planning.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Create and follow up SR, coordinate actions with Oracle Support Metalink
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Configure and setup various Oracle modules to provide better functions
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Conduct software updates, upgrades and patches
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • May support O2C and Financial modules when needed
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Provide user training and SOP (standard operation procedures)
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Gather and analyze business requirements to plan projects or improvements
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Design, build, test and implement solutions for business process requirements
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Manage small projects of upgrade and solution implementation
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Independently complete feasibility study, cost-benefit analysis and verifying change results.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Work with technical team, contractors, vendors and users.
    • &amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;

REQUIREMENTS

&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Bachelors Degree in computer science, Information Technology, or Software engineering, or related majors.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Complete at least one implementation of Oracle applications in the following area: Manufacture (Inventory, WIP, BOM, ASCP, MRP).
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • At least 5 years Oracle Applications functional experience with full life-cycle implementation experience, including production support
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Detailed functional knowledge of the modules listed above.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Well understanding of Oracle functions and be able to explain to users.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Hands-on setup R12 in Finance, Supply Chain, Planning, and Manufacturing.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Very familiar with Oracle Standard reports
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Specify and coordinate developing of new reports.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Demonstrate solid documentation skill using AIM, such as BR100, MD050, TE040, TE050, MD120, etc.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Have done SOP and training material.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Experienced in using Oracle API in Manufacture and Inventory.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Must be able to demo basic SQL skills.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with supporting users in multiple locations, across multiple time zones.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Ability and willingness to learn new skills, software and technologies.
    • &amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;

Beneficial

&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;
    &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Experience with EDI
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Multiple plans (constraint/unconstraint, ATP)
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • ASCP and Oracle MES.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Oracle BI, discoverer, or other Data Warehouse reports.
    • &amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#9;
  • Oracle WMS, MSCA, and SCM
    • &amp;amp;#13;
&amp;amp;#13; &amp;amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 2 weeks of submitting your application.

item.title: senior Software Sales
item.description:
Seeking a Software Sales Representative

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

Location: Katy, TX

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

Salary: $95,000 &amp;ndash; 145,000

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

RESPONSIBILITIES

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;
    &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Responsible for software sales &amp;ndash; Prospecting, developing and closing complex, new business opportunities, in addition to developing and executing strategic account plans.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Sales will include selling software licenses, software services and sustenance of software maintenance for the geographical region which may include multiple countries.&amp;nbsp;
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Develop a good understanding of field operations and requirements for software, particularly the operator interaction with the system.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Developing competitive sales plans/strategies for software and professional services.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Meeting or exceeding assigned revenue goals by identification, contact, qualification and development of viable new accounts.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Managing the prospecting/demand creation plan development and execution for new greenfield accounts.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Developing, executing and delivering quality solution-focused client presentations
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Presenting and articulating advanced product features, benefits, and overall product solutions
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Linking the solution value to the customer
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Developing and managing reference sites through high quality, technical and professional, client relationships.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Responsible for forecasting all opportunities based on sales model and opportunities.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Representing and protecting the company brand with integrity and professionalism at all times, in all written and oral communication.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Maintaining current knowledge of customer applications, competitive product differences, and social media/collaboration strategies to target and sell to prospective clients.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Interface with the key teams such as Product Development, Project Delivery and Marketing - sharing market intelligence and potential for sales opportunities.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Manage and develop submissions to tenders for customers of products/services working with colleagues to propose a viable end-to-end solution&amp;nbsp;
    • &amp;#13;
&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

REQUIREMENTS

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;
    &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • A proven track record of reaching and exceeding targets.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Outgoing personality with excellent grammar, written and oral communication skills.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Experience with SCADA.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Proven ability to develop a professional rapport, engage prospects in meaningful dialog about issues they are trying solve, and address initial questions and objections confidently and professionally.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Ability to talk to company executives who make business decisions.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Ability to navigate large organizations to identify decision makers and stake holders.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Excellent organizational skills.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Ability to quickly learn processes, systems, industries, products, company, etc.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Constant learning and development&amp;nbsp;of programming skills are expected.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Bachelor Degree in IT, Software Engineering, Business, or acceptable equivalent.
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • 5-7 years of experience in software sales evidenced by sustained over-quota performance
    • &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • The physical ability to immediately respond to emergency situations.
    • &amp;#13;
&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

Preferred:

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;
    &amp;#13; &amp;#9;
  • Knowledge&amp;nbsp;of the production optimization software for Upstream and if possible Pipeline Oil and Gas business.
    • &amp;#13;
&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 2&amp;nbsp;weeks of submitting your application.

&amp;#13; &amp;#13;

&amp;nbsp;

&amp;#13;

item.title: Porter
item.description:
Porter

&#13; &#13;

Seeking&nbsp;a temp-to-hire Porter&nbsp;to join the&nbsp;team to assist the Service and Administrative areas of the dealership.

&#13; &#13;

Compensation: $10&nbsp;to $12 per hour

&#13; &#13;

Responsibilities

&#13; &#13;
    &#13; &#9;
  • Hose&nbsp;off and clean&nbsp;the exterior of vehicles as well as wipe&nbsp;down and clean&nbsp;out the interiors
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Check&nbsp;the washer fluids and other basic fluids in the cars to make sure they are filled for test drives
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Performs simple, basic maintenance, such as battery replacement
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Keep&nbsp;the lot in clean and marketable condition
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Move or rearrange vehicles for sales or for lot reorganization
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Move vehicles into and out of the service garage
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Place materials into vehicles before they are place on the car lot such as car manuals, sale tags, dealer place mats and air fresheners
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Help run errands for car registration and supply pick-ups
    • &#13;
&#13; &#13;

Requirements

&#13; &#13;
    &#13; &#9;
  • Impeccable driving record; will be driving expensive, new vehicles daily
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Must be comfortable driving larger vehicles and be capable of operating vehicles on the dealership lot without damaging them
    • &#13; &#9;
  • High energy individual willing to complete their daily tasks with minimal supervision
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Dependable, timely, and well mannered
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Respectful with a positive attitude, taking pride in their work
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Bilingual is a plus, but not a requirement
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Require a clean background
    • &#13; &#9;
  • Able to work outside throughout the year, although primarily inside a Service building with open bay doors
    • &#13; &#9;
  • High school diploma required
    • &#13;
&#13; &#13;

*Due to the high volume of applications we typically receive, we regret that we are not able to personally respond to all applications. However, if you are invited to take the next step in the process, you will typically be contacted within 2&nbsp;weeks or your application.*

&#13;

item.title: Stand Up Forklift Operator
item.description:
Stand Up Fork Lift Operator

 

Compensation: $11.00 to $11.75 per hour

 

Responsibilities

 
     	
  • This individual will be working in the distribution facility as a forklift operator/picker
    •  	
  • Responsible and accountable for handling and transporting merchandise throughout the Distribution Center
    •  	
  • Ensures merchandise handled is undamaged and in good condition
    •  	
  • Prepare and assist with physical inventory
    •  	
  • Maintains condition of work area (i.e. free of trash, product in correct location, etc.).
    •  	
  • Follows company safety policies and procedures and encourages other associates to do the same.
    •  	
  • Pack, unpack, and mark stock items, using identification tag, stamp, or electronic marking tool or other labeling equipment
    •  	
  • Using electronic check lists to pull product and use RF Scan Guns to scan materials for inventory purposes
    •  	
  • Ensures assigned equipment is kept in proper working order
    •  	
  • Responsible for operating pallet jacks, clamp trucks, and stand-up high reach forklifts to move product/pallets throughout the facility
    •  	
  • If a pallet needs to be broken down then the individual will need do some case picking to ensure the proper amount of products are on the skid
    •  	
  • Individuals will be responsible for loading and unloading trucks with pallets
    •  	
  • All individuals are responsible for keeping a clean and safe work environment and will be responsible for sweeping/mopping aisles during their shift when needed
    •  	
  • Must be open to perform general labor duties for training purposes as well as on occasion as needed (heavy lifting up to 50lbs)
    • 
 

Requirements

 
     	
  • At least 1 year of recent experience driving equipment, stand up/reach required
    •  	
  • 6+ months of general warehouse experience
    •  	
  • Good work ethic, positive attitude and a willingness to learn is a must
    •  	
  • Able to work in a fast-paced environment
    •  	
  • Able to lift up to 50 lbs
    •  	
  • Various shifts available (must be able to work weekends)
    • 
 

**Due to the amount of applications received we regret to inform you that we are unable to personally respond to every applicant.  Should you be chosen to move forward, you will typically be contacted within 3 weeks.**
